title: Identify
text: Identify what you are solving for.
speech: Identify what you are solving for.

title: What Are You Solving For
text: You are solving for the speed of Ashley's parents.
speech: You are solving for the speed of Ashley's parents.
pacedSpeech: You are solving for the speed of Ashley's parents.

title: Make a Variable
text: Create a variable to represent the speed of Ashley's parents. Let's call the this speed $$x$$. Since Ashley's average speed is $$7$$ mph faster than her parents' average speed, Ashley's average speed is $$x+7$$.
speech: Create a variable to represent the speed of Ashley's parents. Let's call the this speed , x . Since Ashley's average speed is  7  mph faster than her parents' average speed, Ashley's average speed is  x, plus 7 .
pacedSpeech: Create a variable to represent the speed of Ashley's parents. Let's call the this speed  , x
mph faster than her parents' average speed, Ashley's average speed is   x, plus 7

title: Translate to Equation
text: Translate the situation into an equation using the variable. Remember the total distance Ashley and her parents travelled is $$234$$ miles, and distance equals the product of speed and time.
speech: Translate the situation into an equation using the variable. Remember the total distance Ashley and her parents travelled is  234  miles, and distance equals the product of speed and time.
pacedSpeech: Translate the situation into an equation using the variable. Remember the total distance Ashley and her parents travelled is   234
miles, and distance equals the product of speed and time.

title: The Equation
speech: The translated equation is  2 x plus, 2 times, parentheses x plus 7,  is equal to 234 .
pacedSpeech: The translated equation is   2 x plus, 2 times,  x plus 7,  is equal to 234

title: Solving the Equation
text: After solving the equation, what do you get for $$x$$?

subHints.title: Solving the Equation
subHints.text: To solve the equation $$2x+2\left(x+7\right)=234$$, we follow these steps: 2x+2x+14=234-->4x=220-->x=55.
